short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Counts the number of open tabs and shows it as the extension icon

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This no-frills extension keeps track of your open Chrome tabs and displays the count directly on the extension icon. Pin it to gently remind you when tab chaos looms.
